messages.content: I just adopted a golden retriever puppy named Max from the shelter last Tuesday.
That's wonderful! Golden retrievers are great family dogs. How old is Max?
He's 3 months old. I scheduled his first vet appointment for next Friday at Dr. Peterson's clinic on Maple Street.
Good idea to get him checked out early. Make sure to bring any paperwork from the shelter.
Will do. I also signed him up for puppy training classes that start on April 1st at PetSmart. They're every Saturday morning at 9am.
Training classes are excellent for socialization. You're doing everything right!
Thanks! My daughter Sarah is so excited. She's been wanting a dog for her 8th birthday, which was last month in February.
